shri lankawe manawa himikam sambandhayen eksath jathinge manawa himikam aayathanayanahi athiwu sanwadayan siyallehidima peni giya ek pradhana karunak wuye aarakshaka ansha prathisanskaranaya kirime awashyathawayayi. 2015 sapthambarayedi shri lanka aanduwada ema yojanawata ekanga wiya.

kese ho awasanaye nawathath angaharuwada hamuwana ekangathwaya athiwa depakshaya sakachchawa hamara karaddi itha pranitha aahara sandaha prasiddha grand monak hotalayedi mema niyojitha pirisata rathri bhojana sangrahayak pawithra wanniaarachchi manthriwariya wisin pawathwana ladi.

- abdul kadarindika polkotuwaratehi subawadi anagathaya wenuwen thindu gath thaman athulu e.ja.pa manthriwarunata winaya parikshana pawathwimata kriya karana wipaksha nayakawaraya dawantha deshapalana pakshayak wu e.ja.pa. ya binduwen binduwata anda damima pilibandawa palamuwa ohuta winaya parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthu yayi mahanuwara disthrik ejapa parlimenthu manthri ee .aar.em. abdul kadar mahatha pawasayi.pakshaye winaya pamanak nowa samastha pakshayama kada binda damu wipaksha nayakayata palamuwa winaya parikshana pawathwa anekuth parikshana in anathuruwa pawathwiya yuthu yayi da ese nomathiwa an kisidu parikshanayak pawathwima walangu nowanne yayi da hethema kiya.
goda kalekata passe thamayi niwedanayata sambandha wune.
